alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 3:14PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Snow showers will impact portions of western Franklin, St. Lawrence and western Essex Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 312 PM EDT, snow showers were reported along a line extending from near Lisbon to 10 miles northeast of Lowville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds 25 mph or greater, and visibility less than a half mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Automated weather station observation at Ogdensburg of a quarter mile visibility. IMPACT...Gusty winds may blow around unsecured objects. Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists. Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Massena, Gouverneur, Canton, Tupper Lake, Ogdensburg, Norfolk, Oswegatchie, Lisbon, Louisville, Moira, De Kalb, Bangor, Fowler, Parishville, Fort Covington, Colton, Bombay, Piercefield and Wawbeek.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Essex
